AllergenSymptoms.AllergenDesctiption: Hives are raised, often itchy, red bumps (welts) on the surface of the skin. They can be an allergic reaction to food or medicine. They can also appear without cause.
Angioedema is the swelling of the deeper layers of the skin, caused by a build-up of fluid.
An oral allergy experience is a tingling sensation in the mouths and on lips in the moments during and after eating the offending food.
